title-group.article-title: A FAST ALGORITHM FOR REVERSION OF POWER SERIES

abstract.p: We give an algorithm for reversion of formal power series, based on an efficient way to implement the Lagrange inversion formula. Our algorithm requires O(n½(M(n) + MM(n½))) operations where M(n) and MM(n) are the costs of polynomial and matrix multiplication, respectively. This matches the asymptotic complexity of an algorithm of Brent and Kung, but we achieve a constant factor speedup whose magnitude depends on the polynomial and matrix multiplication algorithms used. Benchmarks confirm that the algorithm performs well in practice.
